import React from 'react' import orange from "../../Images/Knowledge/orange.png"; import "./feature-3.css"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faBullhorn, faFileExcel, faPlayCircle, faUnlink } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; const Feature3 = () => { return (
